info.title: service-desk
info.description:
Manage IT tickets

**Note:** This schema includes only public API endpoints. Internal endpoints are excluded.

**Note:** Internal headers (x-tenant-id, x-employee-id, x-user-id, x-user-email, x-tenant-roles) are excluded from public documentation.

post.description: Creates a new support ticket in the system

get.description: Lists tickets with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: vip_reporter

schema.description: Filter tickets by VIP status of the reporter employee
schema.title: Vip Reporter

parameters.description: Filter tickets by VIP status of the reporter employee

parameters.name: location_reporter

schema.description: Filter tickets by location of the reporter employee
schema.title: Location Reporter

parameters.description: Filter tickets by location of the reporter employee

get.description: Retrieves a ticket by ID with extended details including watchers

patch.description: Updates an existing ticket with the provided fields

post.description: Query tickets with complex filtering including metadata filters
Update multiple tickets with the same values in a single atomic transaction

get.description: Get custom field values for a ticket (current desk only).

put.description: Set custom field values for a ticket (current desk only).

get.description: Get activity log events for a specific ticket.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: All custom field values namespaced by desk_id

AllCustomFieldValuesResponse.title: AllCustomFieldValuesResponse
AllCustomFieldValuesResponse.description: Response schema for all custom field values (all desks).

AssignFirstResponderRequest.title: AssignFirstResponderRequest
AssignFirstResponderRequest.description: Request to assign ticket to first responder.

assignment_method.description: Assignment method: 'round_robin' (rotate through employees, assigns at creation), 'least_loaded' (assign to employee with fewest tickets, at creation), 'fixed' (always assign to specific employee, assigns at creation), 'first_responder' (assign to first agent who responds)

employee_scope_ids.title: Employee Scope Ids
employee_scope_ids.description: List of employee IDs to include in auto-assignment. For 'fixed' method: must contain exactly 1 employee. For 'round_robin' and 'least_loaded': multiple employees or null (defaults to all desk employees). For 'first_responder': ignored (assigns to whoever responds first). Note: 'harmony_ai' is always excluded from auto-assignment.

AutoAssignmentSettingsCreate.title: AutoAssignmentSettingsCreate
AutoAssignmentSettingsCreate.description: Request to create auto-assignment settings for a desk.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether auto-assignment is enabled for this desk

employee_scope_ids.title: Employee Scope Ids
employee_scope_ids.description: List of employee IDs included in auto-assignment scope

last_assigned_employee_id.title: Last Assigned Employee Id
last_assigned_employee_id.description: Last employee assigned (used for round-robin tracking)

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When the settings were created. Null when returning default state (settings not persisted)

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: When the settings were last updated. Null when returning default state (settings not persisted)

AutoAssignmentSettingsResponse.title: AutoAssignmentSettingsResponse
AutoAssignmentSettingsResponse.description: Response containing auto-assignment settings for a desk.

link_types.title: Link Types
link_types.description: Link types that trigger auto-close (downstream relationships)

eligible_statuses.title: Eligible Statuses
eligible_statuses.description: Only close linked tickets that are in these statuses

ticket_ids.title: Ticket Ids
ticket_ids.description: List of ticket IDs to update

publish_events.title: Publish Events
publish_events.description: Whether to publish domain events for these ticket updates. Set to False to suppress event publishing (useful for bulk imports or migrations). Defaults to True. This suppresses ALL events including status changes, assignee changes, and survey triggers.

BulkUpdateTicketsSLARequest.title: BulkUpdateTicketsSLARequest
BulkUpdateTicketsSLARequest.description: Bulk update SLA fields for multiple tickets.

BulkUpdateTicketsSLAResponse.title: BulkUpdateTicketsSLAResponse
BulkUpdateTicketsSLAResponse.description: Response from bulk SLA update operation.

CloseLinkedTicketsRequest.title: CloseLinkedTicketsRequest
CloseLinkedTicketsRequest.description: Request to close linked tickets when parent is resolved/closed.

options.title: Options
options.description: Field options (e.g., choices for select fields)

description.title: Description
description.description: Desk description - will be used by Harmony AI Agent for classifying tickets

CreateSubdeskRequest.title: CreateSubdeskRequest
CreateSubdeskRequest.description: Request to create a subdesk (team) within a desk.

notification_id.title: Notification Id
notification_id.description: Notification ID for threading reminders as replies

CreateSurveyResponseRequest.title: CreateSurveyResponseRequest
CreateSurveyResponseRequest.description: Request to create a pending survey response.

template_id.title: Template Id
template_id.description: Template ID to create desk from (e.g., 'it', 'hr')

name.title: Name
name.description: Optional custom name for the desk (overrides template name)

CreateTemplateDeskRequest.title: CreateTemplateDeskRequest
CreateTemplateDeskRequest.description: Request to create a desk from a template.

CreateTicketFromEmailRequest.title: CreateTicketFromEmailRequest
CreateTicketFromEmailRequest.description: Request to create a ticket from an email (internal endpoint).

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Optional creation timestamp. If not provided, current time will be used. Used for preserving original ITSM timestamps during import.

publish_events.title: Publish Events
publish_events.description: Whether to publish events for this message. Set to False during imports to prevent notifications and automations from triggering.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values for this desk

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Optional creation timestamp. If not provided, current time will be used. Used for preserving original ITSM timestamps during import.

related_asset_ids.title: Related Asset Ids
related_asset_ids.description: List of asset IDs (UUIDs) to associate with this ticket

publish_events.title: Publish Events
publish_events.description: Whether to publish domain events for this ticket creation. Set to False to suppress event publishing (useful for bulk imports or migrations). Defaults to True.

thread_id.title: Thread Id
thread_id.description: Optional thread ID to associate with this ticket. If not provided a new thread will be created.

reporter.title: Reporter
reporter.description: ID of the reporter if creating on behalf of another user

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values as key-value pairs for the current desk

CustomFieldValuesRequest.title: CustomFieldValuesRequest
CustomFieldValuesRequest.description: Request schema for setting custom field values on a ticket.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values for the current desk

CustomFieldValuesResponse.title: CustomFieldValuesResponse
CustomFieldValuesResponse.description: Response schema for custom field values.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field definitions for this desk.

subdesks.title: Subdesks
subdesks.description: Subdesks within this desk (only populated when include_subdesks=true)

EntityType.title: EntityType
EntityType.description: Supported entity types in the Harmony platform (actors and targets).

actor.description: The actor that triggered this event

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: The target resources affected by this event (at least one)

EventData.title: EventData
EventData.description: Event data payload with required actor and targets.

EventEntity.title: EventEntity
EventEntity.description: Represents the entity in the event can be Actor or Target of the event.

EventTag.title: EventTag
EventTag.description: Represents a tag with key-value structure.

EventsResponse.title: EventsResponse
EventsResponse.description: Events response model matching CloudEvents structure.

answer_summary.title: Answer Summary
answer_summary.description: 2-3 sentence summary of the suggested resolution

chunks_count.title: Chunks Count
chunks_count.description: Number of KB chunks used to generate the resolution

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: Confidence score for the KB answer (0.0-1.0)

queried_at.title: Queried At
queried_at.description: Timestamp when the KB was queried

KBResolutionResponse.title: KBResolutionResponse
KBResolutionResponse.description: Knowledge base resolution suggestion for a ticket.

total_count.title: Total Count
total_count.description: The total number of items available to return for this query.

is_already_added.title: Is Already Added
is_already_added.description: Whether this template is already added for the tenant

PredefinedDeskTemplateResponse.title: PredefinedDeskTemplateResponse
PredefinedDeskTemplateResponse.description: Response schema for a predefined desk template.

PredefinedDeskTemplatesResponse.title: PredefinedDeskTemplatesResponse
PredefinedDeskTemplatesResponse.description: Response containing all available predefined desk templates.

vip_reporter.title: Vip Reporter
vip_reporter.description: Filter tickets by VIP status of the reporter employee

location_reporter.title: Location Reporter
location_reporter.description: Filter tickets by location of the reporter employee

metadata_filters.title: Metadata Filters
metadata_filters.description: Filter by ticket metadata key-value pairs

employee_ids.title: Employee Ids
employee_ids.description: List of employee IDs to set as subdesk members

SetSubdeskEmployeesRequest.title: SetSubdeskEmployeesRequest
SetSubdeskEmployeesRequest.description:
Request to set employees for a subdesk.

This replaces the entire employee list (delete all, insert new).

StatusManagementSettingsCreate.title: StatusManagementSettingsCreate
StatusManagementSettingsCreate.description: Request schema for creating/updating status management settings.

StatusManagementSettingsResponse.title: StatusManagementSettingsResponse
StatusManagementSettingsResponse.description: Response schema for status management settings.

assignment_method.description: Assignment method: 'round_robin' (rotate through employees, assigns at creation), 'least_loaded' (assign to employee with fewest tickets, at creation), 'fixed' (always assign to specific employee, assigns at creation), 'first_responder' (assign to first agent who responds)

employee_scope_ids.title: Employee Scope Ids
employee_scope_ids.description: List of employee IDs to include in auto-assignment. For 'fixed' method: must contain exactly 1 employee. For 'round_robin' and 'least_loaded': multiple employees or null (defaults to all subdesk employees). For 'first_responder': ignored (assigns to whoever responds first). Note: 'harmony_ai' is always excluded from auto-assignment.

inherit_auto_assignment.title: Inherit Auto Assignment
inherit_auto_assignment.description: If True, inherit auto-assignment settings from Main Subdesk. When enabled, this subdesk uses Main Subdesk's settings instead. Main Subdesk cannot have this set to True.

SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsCreate.title: SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsCreate
SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsCreate.description: Request to create or update auto-assignment settings for a subdesk.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether auto-assignment is enabled for this subdesk

employee_scope_ids.title: Employee Scope Ids
employee_scope_ids.description: List of employee IDs included in auto-assignment scope

last_assigned_employee_id.title: Last Assigned Employee Id
last_assigned_employee_id.description: Last employee assigned (used for round-robin tracking)

inherit_auto_assignment.title: Inherit Auto Assignment
inherit_auto_assignment.description: If True, settings are inherited from Main Subdesk

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When the settings were created. Null when returning default state (settings not persisted)

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: When the settings were last updated. Null when returning default state (settings not persisted)

SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsResponse.title: SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsResponse
SubdeskAutoAssignmentSettingsResponse.description: Response containing auto-assignment settings for a subdesk.

employee_ids.title: Employee Ids
employee_ids.description: List of employee IDs that are members of the subdesk

SubdeskEmployeesResponse.title: SubdeskEmployeesResponse
SubdeskEmployeesResponse.description: Response containing the list of subdesk employees.

TicketByThreadResponse.title: TicketByThreadResponse
TicketByThreadResponse.description: Minimal ticket info for thread-to-ticket lookup.

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values for the current desk

kb_resolution.description: Knowledge base resolution suggestion if available

related_asset_ids.title: Related Asset Ids
related_asset_ids.description: List of asset IDs (UUIDs) associated with this ticket

thread_id.title: Thread Id
thread_id.description: Thread ID for the ticket conversation

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values for the current desk

kb_resolution.description: Knowledge base resolution suggestion if available

related_asset_ids.title: Related Asset Ids
related_asset_ids.description: List of asset IDs (UUIDs) associated with this ticket

thread_id.title: Thread Id
thread_id.description: Thread ID for the ticket conversation

TicketSLAUpdate.title: TicketSLAUpdate
TicketSLAUpdate.description: SLA field updates for a single ticket.

options.title: Options
options.description: Field options (e.g., choices for select fields)

description.title: Description
description.description: Desk description - the description will be used by Harmony AI Agent for classifying tickets

inbox_enabled.title: Inbox Enabled
inbox_enabled.description: Enable/disable email inbox for this desk

inbox_cc_as_watchers.title: Inbox Cc As Watchers
inbox_cc_as_watchers.description: Add CC recipients as ticket watchers when creating tickets from email

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable/disable this desk. Disabled desks are hidden from listings.

UpdateSurveyResponseRequest.title: UpdateSurveyResponseRequest
UpdateSurveyResponseRequest.description: Request to update a survey response with rating.

subdesk_id.title: Subdesk Id
subdesk_id.description: Subdesk ID to move ticket to (must be in same desk)

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Custom field values for the current or new desk

attachment_ids.title: Attachment Ids
attachment_ids.description: List of attachment IDs to link to this ticket

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Optional creation timestamp override. Used for backfilling original ITSM timestamps during re-evaluation.

publish_events.title: Publish Events
publish_events.description: Whether to publish domain events for this ticket update. Set to False to suppress event publishing (useful for bulk imports or migrations). Defaults to True. This suppresses ALL events including status changes, assignee changes, and survey triggers.

UpdateWatchersNotificationReplyIdRequest.title: UpdateWatchersNotificationReplyIdRequest
UpdateWatchersNotificationReplyIdRequest.description: Request to update watchers' notification_reply_id for a ticket.

ticket_ids.title: Ticket Ids
ticket_ids.description: List of ticket IDs to mark reminders as sent

service_desk__schemas__desk_survey_setti.title: MarkRemindersSentRequest
service_desk__schemas__desk_survey_setti.description: Request to mark survey reminders as sent.
